name: Air Elemental Myrmidon
languages: Auran, one language of its creator's choice
resist: lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Weapons
text: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The myrmidon makes three flail attacks.

action.name: Flail
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 6)
text: The myrmidon makes one flail attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 18 (4d8) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

description:
Air Elemental Myrmidon. Elemental myrmidons are elementals conjured and bound by magic into ritually created suits of plate armor. In this form, they possess no recollection of their former existence as free elementals. They exist only to follow the commands of their creators.
Source: Mordenkainen's Tome of Foes p. 202, Essentials Kit: Divine Contention, Essentials Kit: Dragon of Icespire Peak, Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath, Princes of the Apocalypse p. 212
